name: Sins of the Flesh (demo)
description:
Sins of the Flesh is a darkly comedic, subversive love story told through a series of vignettes. The first of these is available in the demo where we get to meet the protagonist Sylphi Sansevaro, a misunderstood, seemingly stoic young woman.

The demo is meant to give an idea of thematic and aesthetic elements.

The final project will be more of a Frankenstein-esque murder/love story where the player will assume the role of a gifted medical student who resorts to murder in order to harvest organs to save the one she loves.
